title: Two jawans, five locals injured as firing continues in Manipur
selftext: And all is well in Manipur
comments:
The forces found a handful of arms that is great but what about the thousands of arms and multiple of ammunition?

Jawan sare dying and this seems normal. Modi is out these giving revaris and trying to bribe and win elections. Manipur has been forgotten
